Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the lantibiotics family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Similar to Gallidermin and epidermin. The fourth residue was phenylalanine in BacCH91 but lysine in both epidermin and gallidermin, which explains the more hydrophobic character of BacCH91.
Sequence Information.Comments: The bacteriocin was not affected by any of the staphylococcal peptidases tested, particularly StpC. BacCH91 was unaffected by trypsin and proteinase K.

Literature.Title: Isolation, biochemical characterization, and cloning of a bacteriocin from the poultry-associated Staphylococcus aureus strain CH-91.
Literature.Author: Wladyka B, Wielebska K, Wloka M, Bochenska O, Dubin G, Dubin A, Mak P.
